message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at a special price of $200. I believe it will be very valuable to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a certain budget. Can you meet me at $60?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your budget constraints, but $60 is too low.  Could you do $130?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $80. That's the highest I can go. Can you do that?
